item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description:
i keep tryin to tell myself i'm sick of the o rly? bird... and then someone posts it, i look at it in all its dumbfounded glory of an expression, and i laugh again.
i'm an addict i guess, in denile, but still wanting another fix.
item.content:encoded:
i keep tryin to tell myself i’m sick of the o rly? bird… and then someone posts it, i look at it in all its dumbfounded glory of an expression, and i laugh again.

i’m an addict i guess, in denile, but still wanting another fix.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
And good job on reworking the tired and the trite. I'll be hijacking those this weekend to use on one of our druids ... wah wah wah, I don't have DKP cuz I spent it all on Cenarion, wah wah wah, I died because our tanks suxorzorz.
I'll have to trick him into taking me off his ignore list first.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Foton

item.description:
That's why you should volunteer to be one of AFK Gamer's unpaid and overworked field reporters.

item.title: By: Dawnshroud
item.dc:creator: Dawnshroud
item.description: The "farmers" are getting ridiculous. I loved your "Hamlet of Dire Maul" article, I play on Warsong ( US ) and I have not seen all of the stuff on the AH everyone else claims to be seeing, and I'm glad I haven't. I tried doing the solo farm DM strategy, just zoning into West, and going for the first chest / tome, but I had no luck what so ever. The O RLY, YA RLY?, NO WAI, is getting old. The L2P is also way overused. Noone can be creative anymore, it's sad.
item.content:encoded: The “farmers” are getting ridiculous. I loved your “Hamlet of Dire Maul” article, I play on Warsong ( US ) and I have not seen all of the stuff on the AH everyone else claims to be seeing, and I’m glad I haven’t. I tried doing the solo farm DM strategy, just zoning into West, and going for the first chest / tome, but I had no luck what so ever. The O RLY, YA RLY?, NO WAI, is getting old. The L2P is also way overused. Noone can be creative anymore, it’s sad.
